{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard The ID and name of your current company is displayed. \f0\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard\f0 The\f0  name or\f0  description of the company displayed in the \b Company\b0  field. You cannot change the description in this field.\par
}

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252{\fonttbl{\f0}}\fs20\pard When the dialog box is opened, the checkbox for your current company is selected. To change company, select the check box for another company and press \b OK\b0 .\f0\par
}
